BlockingResultÔÉÅ

Contains the BlockingResult class for analyzing and printing blocking results.

class blockingpy.blocking_result.BlockingResult(x_df: DataFrame, ann: str, deduplication: bool, n_original_records: tuple[int, int], true_blocks: DataFrame | None, eval_metrics: Series | None, confusion: DataFrame | None, colnames_xy: ndarray, graph: bool | None = False, reduction_ratio: float | None = None)[source]ÔÉÅ

Bases: object

A class to represent and analyze the results of a blocking operation.

This class provides functionality to analyze and evaluate blocking results, including calculation of reduction ratios, metrics evaluation, and optional graph representation of the blocking structure.

Parameters:

  • x_df (pandas.DataFrame) ‚Äì DataFrame containing blocking results with columns [‚Äòx‚Äô, ‚Äòy‚Äô, ‚Äòblock‚Äô, ‚Äòdist‚Äô]

  • ann (str) ‚Äì The blocking method used (e.g., ‚Äònnd‚Äô, ‚Äòhnsw‚Äô, ‚Äòannoy‚Äô, etc.)

  • deduplication (bool) ‚Äì Whether the blocking was performed for deduplication

  • true_blocks (pandas.DataFrame, optional) ‚Äì DataFrame with true blocks to calculate evaluation metrics

  • n_original_records (tuple[int, int]) ‚Äì Number of records in the original dataset(s)

  • eval_metrics (pandas.Series, optional) ‚Äì Evaluation metrics if true blocks were provided

  • confusion (pandas.DataFrame, optional) ‚Äì Confusion matrix if true blocks were provided

  • colnames_xy (numpy.ndarray) ‚Äì Column names used in the blocking process

  • graph (bool, optional) ‚Äì Whether to create a graph from the blocking results (default False)

  • reduction_ratio (float, optional) ‚Äì Pre-calculated reduction ratio (default None)

Notes

The class provides methods for calculating reduction ratio and formatting evaluation metrics for blocking quality assessment.
